resources.string:
Welcome to Color Helper! (v 0.1.0) 

To take a picture in a certain half of the screen, simply tap the "Take … Picture" button for the corresponding half. 

To identify a color in a picture, tap the color once. 

To clear the color tags in one half of the screen, tap the "Clear" button in that half. 

To remove the image entirely, tap the "Retake … Picture" button for the half you want to wipe. 

You can toggle the flash by pressing the flash button on the bottom right, but turning the flash will have a significantly negative impact on color detection.
